parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the peripheral configuration structure.

memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_I2S_Type *p_reg, uint32_t mask, uint8_t irq_priority, bool enable)
memberdef.name: nrfy_i2s_int_init

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the specified I2S interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be initialized.
Interrupt priority.
True if interrupts are to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the I2S interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for processing the specified I2S events.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of events to be processed, created by NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().
Pointer to the structure containing buffers associated with the last transaction. Can be NULL.

simplesect.para: Mask of events that were generated and processed. To be checked against the result of NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the I2S transaction buffers.

detaileddescription.para: If the transfer in a given direction is not required, pass NULL instead of the pointer to the corresponding buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure containing transaction buffers.

briefdescription.para: Function for starting the I2S transaction.

detaileddescription.para: If the transfer in a given direction is not required, pass NULL instead of the pointer to the corresponding buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure containing transaction buffers if the transaction is to be blocking. NULL for non-blocking transactions.

briefdescription.para: Function for aborting the ongoing I2S transaction.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure containing transaction buffers if the abort is to be blocking. NULL for non-blocking operation.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the pins selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the I2S pin configuration structure.

simplesect.para: nrf_i2s_task_trigger Function for activating the specified I2S task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task to be activated.

simplesect.para: nrf_i2s_task_address_get Function for getting the address of the specified I2S task register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Specified task.

simplesect.para: Address of the specified task register.
nrf_i2s_event_clear Function for clearing the specified I2S event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to clear.

simplesect.para: nrf_i2s_event_check Function for retrieving the state of the I2S event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to be checked.
The event has been generated.
The event has not been generated.

simplesect.para: nrf_i2s_event_address_get Function for getting the address of the specified I2S event register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Specified event.

simplesect.para: Address of the specified event register.
nrf_i2s_int_enable Function for enabling specified interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_i2s_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_i2s_int_disable Function for disabling specified interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_i2s_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_i2s_int_enable_check Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_i2s_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: Mask of enabled interrupts.
nrf_i2s_enable Function for enabling the I2S peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_i2s_disable Function for disabling the I2S peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_i2s_subscribe_set Function for setting the subscribe configuration for a given I2S task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to subscribe events.

simplesect.para: nrf_i2s_subscribe_clear Function for clearing the subscribe configuration for a given I2S task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to clear the configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_i2s_publish_set Function for setting the publish configuration for a given I2S event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to publish the event.

simplesect.para: nrf_i2s_publish_clear Function for clearing the publish configuration for a given I2S event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to clear the configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_i2s_pins_set Function for configuring I2S pins.

detaileddescription.para: Usage of the SDOUT, SDIN, and MCK signals is optional. If a given signal is not needed, pass the NRF_I2S_PIN_NOT_CONNECTED value instead of its pin number.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure with pins selection.

simplesect.para: nrf_i2s_sck_pin_get Function for getting the SCK pin selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: SCK pin selection.
nrf_i2s_lrck_pin_get Function for getting the LRCK pin selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: LRCK pin selection.
nrf_i2s_mck_pin_get Function for getting the MCK pin selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: MCK pin selection.
nrf_i2s_sdout_pin_get Function for getting the SDOUT pin selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: SDOUT pin selection.
nrf_i2s_sdin_pin_get Function for getting the SDIN pin selection.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: SDIN pin selection.
nrf_i2s_configure Function for setting the I2S peripheral configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure with configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_i2s_transfer_set Function for setting up the I2S transfer.

detaileddescription.para: This function sets up the RX and TX buffers and enables reception or transmission (or both) accordingly. If the transfer in a given direction is not required, pass NULL instead of the pointer to the corresponding buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Size of the buffers (in 32-bit words).
Pointer to the receive buffer. Pass NULL to disable reception.
Pointer to the transmit buffer. Pass NULL to disable transmission.

simplesect.para: nrf_i2s_rx_buffer_set Function for setting the pointer to the receive buffer.
The size of the buffer can be set only by calling nrf_i2s_transfer_set.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the receive buffer.

simplesect.para: nrf_i2s_rx_buffer_get Function for getting the pointer to the receive buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the receive buffer.
nrf_i2s_tx_buffer_set Function for setting the pointer to the transmit buffer.
The size of the buffer can be set only by calling nrf_i2s_transfer_set.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the transmit buffer.

simplesect.para: nrf_i2s_tx_buffer_get Function for getting the pointer to the transmit buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the transmit buffer.
